awards.title: Conestoga Co-Op Student of the Year Award
awards.summary: I was awarded a Conestoga Co-Op Student of the Year Award in 2015 for my Co-Op work at Brose Canada Inc. where I developed several web systems to help them optimize their production processes. This is a prestigious award that is given to students who demonstrate significant job achievement, academic achievement, and extracurricular involvement in the school and/or community.

awards.title: Skills Canada Web Development Gold Medal
awards.summary: I was awarded the Skills Canada Web Development Gold Medal in 2015 for my proficiency in front-end and back-end web development at the Skills Canada 2015 competition in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan. I had advanced through the college competition and a provincial competition before winning nationally. Skills Canada is a well known organization that organizes a national event each year in a rotating province with hundreds of competitions in various skill trade fields.
